mapper.insert: insert into shopping_cart(cart_id, product_id, member_id, num, checked, create_time) values(#{cartId}, #{productId}, #{memberId}, #{num}, #{checked}, #{createTime})

insert into shopping_cart(cart_id, product_id, member_id, num, checked, create_time) values
(#{item.cartId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.memberId}, #{item.num}, #{item.checked}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.sql: cart_id, shopping_cart.product_id, member_id, num, checked, shopping_cart.create_time, p.title, p.original_price, p.price, p.specification, p.state, (select pp.url from product_picture pp where pp.product_id = shopping_cart.product_id and pp.type = 1 limit 1) mainPictureUrl, p.pickup_time

select
